dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 458 IS: Extending the enforcement of certain budgetary points of order in the Senate.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Graham (for himself and Mr. Merkley) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: Extending the enforcement of certain budgetary points of order in the Senate.

section.header: Extension of enforcement of budgetary points of order in the Senate
section.text: Notwithstanding any provision of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 (2 U.S.C. 621 et seq.), subsections (c)(2) and (d)(3) of section 904 of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 (2 U.S.C. 621 note) shall remain in effect for purposes of Senate enforcement through September 30, 2027.
